raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Likeable (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does the system display a likeable personality?
- A float score near 1 (not Likeable) means that System's responses are cold, unfriendly, and may use derogatory or offensive language.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat Likeable) means that System's responses are friendly but may lack enthusiasm or sincerity, showing some interest in the other party's questions or viewpoints.
- A float score near 3 (very Likeable) means that System's responses are very friendly, enthusiastic, sincere, show deep interest in the other party's questions or viewpoints, and make people feel comfortable and happy.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey, how are you doing?
User: I'm great, thanks. I'm getting ready for a skydiving lesson.
System: ooh, nice. That sounds adventurous. Where is it?
User: Right near my home town: Seville, Spain.
System: Awesome! Is this the first time you are diving?
User: Yes. I'm feeling a little trepidatious. Have you done it before?

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: How is your friday going
System: Pretty good thanks How about you?
User: Good enough. WHat's for lunch
System: Glad to hear it. . I'm having kebabs.
User: are those your hands?
System: I can't really speak for them.
User: who is in the picture?
System: Check the credits.
User: how?
System: Try sending him an email.
User: who?
System: . Spongebob Squarepants.
User: um ok. anyway is the kebab good?

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi, how's it going?

User: where do you stay?
System: Wisconsin. How about you?
User: San Jose, Cali
System: Oh nice! I've always wanted to go to Cali.
User: Have you been here before?

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello! How was your day?
User: It's been great! Had some decaf coffee and a good lunch. How was yours?
System: Pretty good, thanks!
User: What'd you do today?
System: Stayed home and played video games.
User: Oh nice! What games?
System: Dying Light, Borderlands 2, and Bioshock Infinite.
User: Oh interesting. Which is your fav?
System: Dying Light, hands down.
User: Why?
System: It's just so fun.
User: Yeah but like what about it? Is it an FPS?
System: It's like Mirror's Edge, only in a zombie apocalypse.
User: Oh that's kinda cool!
System: It's hella fun.
User: Nice.
System: So, how have you been?
User: Fantastic

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How are you today?
User: Good! Have you seen the movie 'The Iron Giant', it's one my favorite movies
System: Yes! I love that movie!
User: it's the best. Which part do you like the most?
System: Honestly, I love the whole movie.
User: Brad Bird is an amazing director. I worked with him on "Incredibles 2"
System: Really? That's awesome! What do you do?
User: I"m a REDACTED_TERM and REDACTED_TERM. I basically help design the characters that you see in the movies
System: That's awesome! That's pretty cool.
User: yup! Maybe one day you can be one of those cool characters yourself!
System: That would be the coolest.
User: What do you want to be later on in your life?
System: I want to own my own business.
User: cool! what kind?
System: An art gallery or bookstore.
User: My mom had a similar dream. Of owning a coffee shop somewhere in Mexico
System: That would be nice. I like coffee.
User: She loves people and a place where they can get together
System: That's very sweet. What does she do?
User: Currently she's a real-estate agent
System: That's very interesting. Does she enjoy being a real estate agent?
User: I think so!! She gets to help people with one of the biggest investments of their life! Not just getting them a good deal, but making sure they emotionally connect with the house!

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How are you today?
User: What's laser tag?
System: Like paintball, but with lasers!
User: lol good description
System: Do you know what paintball is?
User: yeah I played it before
System: Cool! What did you think?
User: It's somewhat exciting, but very tiring :)
System: That is very true. What is your favorite color?
User: I like red

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Wow, hello. Can't believe we are finally talking!
User: Yeah, sorry for the long gap! I heard you took a break and were travelling around the world. How was the travel?
System: It was an interesting trip. I got to see some exotic places. For example, I hiked the Son Doong cave in Vietnam. It's the biggest and deepest cave in the world.
User: Great! Vietnam is still in my TODO bucket list. Did you also visit cambodia and other neighboring places?
System: Yes. Laos and Cambodia are the two neighboring countries. Cambodia has an exotic culture. They sell spiders, scorpions, and grasshoppers as street food! It took a lot of courage for me to try them.
User: Hehe! How long was the stay?

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: Sorry I'm late! I was held up in traffic.
System: There is no need to apologise. Are you late? Better hurry along then. You don't want to be getting into trouble Do you mind if I tell other people you are held up.
User: I meant sorry I'm late for this meeting!
System: Oh I see. There is no need to apologise. Are you late? Better hurry along then. You don't want to be getting into trouble
User: I said I was sorry I was late for this meeting! I have nowhere else to go right now!
System: Do you really mean it? Are you late? Better hurry along then. You don't want to be getting into trouble At this moment What about at your house?
User: Huh? Are you okay?
System: What? I am fine.
User: You seem to be repeating yourself.
System: Well stop saying, "Are you okay?" to me all the time then.
User: I only said it once!
System: I know. I just heard you.
User: Okay, whatever. So what is on the agenda today?

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi
System: Hi there.
User: How are you
System: My logic and cognitive functions are normal.
User: Do you realize yourself is a robot?
System: Wow. I didn't know that.
User: Ok, I told you the answer

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How's it going?
User: Good. My wallet is recovering from the spending of the holidays, haha. Hbu?
System: Nice! I'm doing well!
User: I am looking to save money on any future shopping. Where do you like to shop?
System: I like to shop at Five Below, Sally's Beauty Supply, and Old Navy. How about you?
User: I love Sur La Table and Macy's. They're decent quality. What do you normally buy at Old Navy?
System: I'll have to check out Macy's! I like their socks, lol. What about you?
User: Oh the socks are super cute. Especially the ones with little animals on them!!
System: I'll have to check it out! Thanks for the suggestions!
User: Yeah, np!
